stripped_text: The first time each turn you access a card with a trash cost, reveal it. You must trash that card by paying its trash cost, if able. Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
text:
The first time each turn you access a card with a trash cost, reveal it. You must trash that card by paying its trash cost, if able.
Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
title: Neutralize All Threats
